original_text: By these three was the third part of men killed, by the fire, and by the smoke, and by the brimstone, which issued out of their mouths.
korean_text: 이 세 재앙 곧 자기들의 입에서 나오는 불과 연기와 유황으로 말미암아 사람 삼분의 일이 죽임을 당하니라

sentences.original_text: By these three was the third part of men killed
sentences.korean_translation: 이 세 가지로 사람의 삼분의 일이 죽임을 당하였으니

sentences.original_text: which issued out of their mouths
